entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers this morning. Snow level rising to 2400 metres this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 6 except minus 1 near Lake Louise.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. A few showers beginning this evening. A few flurries near Lake Louise overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low 6 except minus 1 near Lake Louise. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
